005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.List;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
023
024/**
025 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
026 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-head">array:head</a>
027 * function.
028 */
029public final class ArrayHead {
030  private static final String NAME = "head";
031  @NonNull
032  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
033      .name(NAME)
034      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
035      .deterministic()
036      .contextIndependent()
037      .focusIndependent()
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("array")
040          .type(IArrayItem.class)
041          .one()
042          .build())
043      .returnType(IItem.class)
044      .returnZeroOrOne()
045      .functionHandler(ArrayHead::execute)
046      .build();
047
048  private ArrayHead() {
049    // disable construction
050  }
051
052  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
053  @NonNull
054  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
055      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
056      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
057      IItem focus) {
058    IArrayItem<?> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
059
060    ICollectionValue result = head(array);
061    return result == null ? ISequence.empty() : result.asSequence();
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
066   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-head">array:head</a>.
067   *
068   * @param <T>
069   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
070   * @param array
071   *          the array to get the head item from
072   * @return the head item
073   */
074  @Nullable
075  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> T head(@NonNull IArrayItem<T> array) {
076    return array.isEmpty() ? null : array.get(0);
077  }
078}
